Lapras (TCG)

From Bulbapedia, the community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia.
Jump to navigationJump to search
← #0130: Gyarados
Pokémon
#0132: Ditto →
For Pokémon TCG Pocket cards, see Lapras (TCG Pocket).

Lapras has been featured on 38 different cards since it debuted in the Fossil expansion of the Pokémon Trading Card Game. Lapras cards are normally Water-type Basic Pokémon.

List of Pokémon cards featuring Lapras

Lapras
Cards listed with a blue background are only legal to use in the current Expanded format.
Cards listed with a green background are legal to use in both the current Standard and Expanded formats.
